EmailTemplate.subject: Head of School Tour booking confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.CreatedDate}
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for considering St Andrews Cathedral School for your child’s education and development. As requested, you have been booked into the Head of School Tour at 9.00am on {!Lead.School_Tour_Date__c} and we will email one week prior to remind you and provide further details.
In the meantime, if there's anything else we can help you with, please do not hesitate to contact us.
To keep up to date with what’s happening across our K-12 St Andrew’s community, visit our facebook page. It’s updated daily during term time with news, photos, events and mini videos.
Yours Sincerely,
Robyn Pedley Enrolment Assistant
